title: 'Compatible with i products'
body: This is belkins 30W charging adapter. It is small and less in weight compare to regular 30W apple charging adapter. I'm using it for my Macbook AIR M1 since 1 week and it is charging my Macbook at same speed as regular one. The only issue i see is adapter is getting heated.

title: 'Trusted brand but important catch'
body: I bought this charger as I need conviniance of charging multiple elctornic gadgets.  Though pricy compared to other Chinese made charger, I purchase this because it is trusted brand and look at their confidence when they say 2500dollars if charger caused any issue to our gadgets subject to some conditions this shows how confident they are in their product. With non branded charger I don't want to take chance to my devices.  There is one catch : your charging wire at both ends should be type C only (thin pin) for android device. Otherwise you Need to buy new wire which is competiable with this charger.

title: 'Govind Reddy'
body: 'It is dual C type port adapter and it supports iPhone fast charging and as well to charge iWatch or AirPods simultaneously with fast charging. Instead of carrying 2 adapters.. you can carry 1 adapter and you can fast charge 2 devices at a time . Adapter is at par with original Apple adapter. It is certified by Apple. Very good for frequent travellers no need to buy expensive Apple dual MagSafe'
